14.verse: Pilato anafunsa kuti, “Chifukwa chiyani? Wapalamula mlandu wotani?” Koma anafuwula kwambiri, “Mpachikeni!”

15.verse: Pilato pofuna kuwakondweretsa anthuwo, anawamasulira Baraba. Analamula kuti Yesu akwapulidwe mwankhanza, ndipo anamupereka kuti akapachikidwe.

16.verse: Chipongwe cha Asilikali - Asilikali anamutenga Yesu ndi kupita naye mʼkati mwa nyumba yaufumu (dera lokhalako asilikali a mfumu) ndipo anasonkhanitsa gulu lonse la asilikali.

17.verse: Anamuveka Iye mwinjiro wofiira, kenaka analuka chipewa cha minga ndi kuyika pa mutu pake.

18.verse: Ndipo anayamba kunena kwa lye kuti, “Ulemu kwa inu Mfumu ya Ayuda!”

19.verse: Ndipo anamugogoda pa mutu mobwerezabwereza ndi ndodo ndi kumulavulira. Anamugwadira ndi kumulambira Iye.

20.verse: Ndipo anamuchita chipongwe, anamuvula mwinjiro wofiira uja ndi kumuveka zovala zake. Kenaka anamutenga kuti akamupachike.

21.verse: Yesu Apachikidwa pa Mtanda - Munthu wina ochokera ku Kurene, Simoni, abambo a Alekisanda ndi Rufasi amadutsa kuchokera ku dziko la kwawo, ndipo anamuwumiriza kuti anyamule mtanda.

22.verse: Anafika naye Yesu pa malo otchedwa Gologota (kutanthauza kuti, malo a bade)

23.verse: Kenaka anamupatsa Iye vinyo wosakaniza ndi mure, koma Iye sanamwe.

24.verse: Ndipo anamupachika Iye. Anachita maere ogawana zovala zake kuti aone chimene aliyense angatenge.

25.verse: Linali ora lachitatu mmawa pamene anamupachika Yesu.

26.verse: Chikwangwani cholembedwapo mlandu wake chinali choti: MFUMU YA AYUDA.

27.verse: Achifwamba awiri anapachikidwanso pamodzi ndi Iye, wina kumanja kwake ndi wina kumanzere kwake.

28.verse: (Ndipo malemba anakwaniritsidwa amene amati, “Iye anayikidwa mʼgulu la anthu oyipa).”

29.verse: Amene amadutsa pafupi anamunenera mawu amwano, akupukusa mitu yawo ndi kuti, “Haa! Iwe amene udzawononga Nyumba ya Mulungu ndi kuyimanganso masiku atatu,

30.verse: tsika kuchoka pa mtandapo ndipo udzipulumutse wekha!”

31.verse: Chimodzimodzinso akulu a ansembe ndi aphunzitsi amalamulo anamunyoza Iye pakati pawo. Iwo anati, “Anapulumutsa ena, koma sangathe kudzipulumutsa yekha!

32.verse: Musiyeni Khristu, Mfumu ya Aisraeli, atsike tsopano kuchoka pa mtanda, kuti ife tione ndi kukhulupirira.” Iwonso amene anapachikidwa naye pamodzi anamulalatira.

33.verse: Imfa ya Yesu - Pa ora lachisanu ndi chimodzi masana mdima unabwera pa dziko lonse mpaka pa ora lachisanu ndi chinayi masana.

34.verse: Pa ora lachisanu ndi chinayi Yesu analira mofuwula kuti, “Eloi, Eloi, lama sabakitani?” Kutanthauza kuti, “Mulungu wanga, Mulungu wanga, mwandisiyiranji Ine?”

35.verse: Ena amene anali pafupi atamva izi anati, “Tamverani, akuyitana Eliya.”

36.verse: Munthu wina anathamanga, natenga chinkhupule atachiviyika mu vinyo wosasa, anachizika ku mtengo, ndi kumupatsa Yesu kuti amwe. Munthuyo anati, “Musiyeni yekha tsopano. Tiyeni tione ngati Eliya angabwere kudzamutsitsa.”

37.verse: Ndi mawu ofuwula, Yesu anapuma komaliza.

38.verse: Chinsalu chotchinga cha mʼNyumba ya Mulungu chinangʼambika pakati kuyambira pamwamba mpaka pansi.

39.verse: Ndipo Kenturiyo, amene anayima patsogolo pa Yesu, atamva kulira kwake ndi kuona mmene anafera anati, “Zoonadi, uyu anali Mwana wa Mulungu.”

40.verse: Amayi ena anali patali kuonerera. Pakati pawo panali Mariya Magadalena, Mariya amayi a Yakobo wamngʼono ndi Yose ndi Salome.

41.verse: Amayi awa ankamutsatira Iye mu Galileya ndi kumutumikira Iye pa zosowa zake. Amayi enanso ambiri amene anabwera naye ku Yerusalemu analinso pomwepo.

42.verse: Yesu Ayikidwa Mʼmanda - Linali Tsiku Lokonzekera (kunena kuti, tsiku lomwe limatsatizana ndi Sabata). Choncho madzulo atayandikira,

43.verse: Yosefe wa ku Arimateyu, mkulu wolamulira odziwika bwino, amene amadikirira ufumu wa Mulungu, anapita kwa Pilato molimba mtima ndi kukapempha mtembo wa Yesu.

44.verse: Pilato anadabwa pakumva kuti anali atamwalira kale. Anayitana Kenturiyo, namufunsa ngati Yesu anali atamwalira kale.

45.verse: Atawuzidwa ndi Kenturiyo kuti zinali motero, anapereka mtembowo kwa Yosefe.

46.verse: Choncho Yosefe anagula nsalu yabafuta, natsitsa thupi, ndipo analikulunga mʼnsalu, naliyika mʼmanda amene anawagoba pa mwala. Kenaka anagubuduza mwala umene anatseka nawo mandawo.

47.verse: Mariya Magadalena ndi Mariya amayi a Yose anaona kumene anamuyika Yesu.

1.verse: Kuuka kwa Yesu - Litapita tsiku la Sabata, Mariya Magadalena, ndi amayi ake a Yakobo, ndi Salome anagula zonunkhiritsa ndi cholinga chakuti apite akadzoze thupi la Yesu.

2.verse: Mmamawa, tsiku loyamba la Sabata, dzuwa litangotuluka kumene, anali pa ulendo wopita ku manda

3.verse: ndipo anafunsana wina ndi mnzake kuti, “Kodi akatikugudubuzira mwala pa khomo la manda ndani?”

4.verse: Koma atakweza maso awo, anaona kuti mwala umene unali waukulu kwambiri wagubuduzidwa kale.

5.verse: Atalowa mʼmanda, anaona mnyamata atavala mwinjiro woyera atakhala ku mbali ya kumanja, ndipo iwo anachita mantha.

6.verse: Iye anati, “Musaope. Kodi mukufuna Yesu wa ku Nazareti, amene anapachikidwa? Wauka! Sali muno. Onani malo amene anamugonekapo.

7.verse: Koma pitani, kawuzeni ophunzira ake ndi Petro kuti, ‘Iye watsogola kupita ku Galileya. Kumeneko mukamuona Iye monga momwe anakuwuzirani.’ ”

8.verse: Akunjenjemera ndi kudabwa, amayiwo anatuluka ndipo anathawa ku mandako. Sananene china chilichonse kwa aliyense, chifukwa anachita mantha.

9.verse: [Mipukutu yoyambirira ndi maumboni akale mulibe vesi 9 mpaka 20.]Yesu Aonekera kwa Mariya Magadalena - Yesu atauka kwa akufa mmawa pa tsiku loyamba la Sabata, anayamba kuonekera kwa Mariya Magadalena, amene anatulutsa mwa iye ziwanda zisanu ndi ziwiri.

10.verse: Iye anapita ndi kukawawuza amene anali ndi Yesu, amene ankakhuza maliro ndi kulira.

11.verse: Atamva kuti Yesu ali moyo ndikuti amuona, iwo sanakhulupirire.

12.verse: Yesu Aonekera kwa Ophunzira Awiri - Zitatha izi Yesu anaonekera mʼmaonekedwe ena kwa awiri a iwo amene anali ku dera la ku mudzi.

13.verse: Iwo anabwerera ndi kudzawawuza enawo; koma iwo sanakhulupirirebe.

14.verse: Yesu Ayankhula kwa Ophunzira Khumi ndi Mmodzi - Pambuyo pake Yesu anaonekera kwa khumi ndi mmodziwo pamene ankadya; anawadzudzula chifukwa chopanda chikhulupiriro ndi kukanitsitsa kwawo kuti akhulupirire amene anamuona Iye atauka.

15.verse: Anati kwa iwo, “Pitani mʼdziko lonse lapansi ndipo mukalalikire Uthenga Wabwino kwa zolengedwa zonse.

16.verse: Aliyense amene akakhulupirire nabatizidwa adzapulumuka, koma amene sakakhulupirira adzalangidwa.

17.verse: Tsono zizindikiro izi zidzawatsata amene adzakhulupirira: Mʼdzina langa adzatulutsa ziwanda; adzayankhula malilime atsopano;

18.verse: adzanyamula njoka ndi manja awo; ndipo pamene adzamwa mankhwala akupha, sadzawapweteka nʼpangʼonongʼono pomwe; adzasanjika manja awo pa anthu odwala ndipo odwalawo adzachira.”

19.verse: Yesu Apita Kumwamba - Ambuye Yesu atatha kuyankhulana nawo, anatengedwa kupita kumwamba ndipo anakhala kudzanja lamanja la Mulungu.

20.verse: Pamenepo ophunzira aja anapita ndi kukalalikira ponseponse, ndipo Ambuye anagwira nawo ntchito pamodzi, ndipo anatsimikizira mawuwo ndi zizindikiro zimene ankachita.
